name: TickborneRelapsingFeverTestsForBorreliaHermsiiMiyamotoiParkeriiTuricataeNucleicAcid
title: Tickborne Relapsing Fever (Tests for Borrelia hermsii/miyamotoi/parkerii/turicatae Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Borrelia species Nucleic Acid associated with Tickborne Relapsing Fever),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Borrelia hermsii/miyamotoi/parkerii/turicatae; NAA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
